name: crypto-capsule
description: Send crytocurrencies into the future, safely and securely using Ethereum smart contracts

scripts.test: npx hardhat compile && npx hardhat coverage
scripts.deploy.local: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run --network localhost scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy.test: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run --network rinkenby scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy.arbitrum: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run --network arbitrum scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy.ethereum: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run --network ethereum scripts/deploy.js
scripts.deploy.ropsten: npx hardhat test && npx hardhat run --network ropsten scripts/deploy.js
